quest.name: Time to Shine
journal:
Amh Garanjy knows just what you and your friends can do to put smiles on the children's faces.

※This quest is available for a limited time only.

The snowball cakes you made with Rudy have been packed along with Mother Miounne's other gifts and shipped to Bentbranch Meadows, where they are to be delivered to the children. You, Rudy, and Rissai make your way to the Shroud to seek out Baenfaeld, the celebrant in charge of the task.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Upon seeing the sheer number of gift boxes entrusted to your care, Rissai suggests splitting the task, that you might more swiftly place presents into the young ones' hands. You resolve to follow the ever-eager Rudy and keep watch over him as he passes out his handmade snowball treats.

Rudy gives a gift box to every child he meets. While some are skeptical at first, their faces light up when they see, smell, and taste the delightful and delicious seasonal treats. The children's joy is reflected in Rudy's elated expression at seeing his confections bring so much happiness to those around him. His job done, it appears the little yeti has something to say to you.

Rudy appears to be expressing his satisfaction at being able to serve as one of the saint's little helpers this Starlight. With all the presents safely in the hands of the children, you set out to return to Baenfaeld, who will surely be happy to hear how well this year's gifts were received.

You and Rudy reunite with Rissai and Baenfaeld, but there is unfortunately little time to celebrate your success, as Rudy's brothers─a monstrous pair of yetis─burst into Bentbranch Meadows, intent on taking him back home. Rudy, however, has a thing or two to say to them. With your encouragement─and a confidence altogether new to him─he proudly tells them of how he created the greatest snowball cakes of his life, and helped spread joy to the children this Starlight. One taste of the treats in question is all it takes for his brothers to see how far Rudy has come, and they apologize for treating him so poorly all these years. Finally accepted by his family for who he is, it appears Rudy is ready to return to the mountains.

Rudy is beside himself with gratitude for the role you played in making his first Starlight experience such a memorable one. Much to his delight, the Saint of Nymeia has also left him a letter praising him as the finest little helper of the season. Moved by how far your little friend has come in such a short time─if sad that you must say goodbye─you and Rissai wish Rudy well as he follows his brothers back to their home in the mountains. With nothing left to do here, it is time to report back to Amh Garanjy so that she, too, can take pleasure in your exploits.

Amh Garanjy gives her sincerest thanks for everything you did for Rudy. Moved by his hard work and determination to spread joy to everyone around him, she feels the joyous spirit of the Starlight Celebration burn with a renewed vigor within her. His job here done, Rissai, ever the wanderer, bids you farewell and sets off in search of exotic lands and delightful desserts. For you, however, the festivities are still in full swing, as Amh Garanjy informs you that none other than the Saint of Nymeia himself would have a word with you in person.
objectives: Speak with Baenfaeld at Bentbranch Meadows.
Speak with Amh Garanjy at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: As one of the saint's little helpers, it's Rudy's job to bring presents to the children and put smiles on their faces. And it's our job to help him!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip!

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Well, I do believe it's time to deliver presents to the children. You're still willing to help out, yes?

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: It would be our pleasure─Rudy's most of all. And we'll be there to support him all along the way.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Excellent! On to business, then! My fellow celebrant, Baenfaeld, has been placed in charge of this task. Seek him out at Bentbranch Meadows, and he'll tell you everything you need to know.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Head over to Bentbranch Meadows and tell Baenfaeld I sent you. He'll tell you just how you can go about putting smiles on the children's faces.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: I say, does Rudy not look a bit distressed to you? Can't say I blame him, of course. Being one of the saint's helpers is a lot of pressure for a little yeti.

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip... Yip...

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: 'Bout time ye showed up! Amh mentioned that ye might be helpin' out─an' believe me, we can use all the help we can get.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Then you will have ours! My yeti friend Rudy, Forename, and I, Rissai, are more than happy to aid.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Though I must say, Mother Miounne truly outdid herself this time. Just look at all these presents! Might I suggest that we split the duties, that we might deliver them to the children in a more efficient manner?

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Forename, why don't you take a batch and go with Rudy? Meanwhile, I'll get started from the opposite side.

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip! Yip yip yip yip yip yip yip!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Dear me. Rudy's so raring to go that it might be best to stand aside a bit and leave him to it. It would do wonders for his confidence, and I'm sure the children would delight in getting a gift from a seasonally fitting snow creature.

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: These treats ye brought us are simply scrumptious! Bite-sized with a crispy crunch and jus' the right amount o' sweetness... Ye best keep an eye on me, or I'll eat the lot!

dialogue.name: HUNGRYGIRL04469
dialogue.text: I'm hungry! I hope our presents come soon so we can go home and eat...

dialogue.name: TIMIDBOY04469
dialogue.text: I want a present, too, but... That man standing in front of them looks like he could eat me.

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip!

dialogue.name: TIMIDBOY04469
dialogue.text: P-Please don't eat me!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip!

dialogue.name: HUNGRYGIRL04469
dialogue.text: A present? For us? Why, you must be one of the saint's little helpers!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Rudy presents the gifts with as much of a flourish as his tiny arms can muster.

dialogue.name: HUNGRYGIRL04469
dialogue.text: Wow, these look absolutely delicious! And I was just thinking about how hungry I was. Lucky me!

dialogue.name: TIMIDBOY04469
dialogue.text: Are you sure these are safe to eat? I suppose they must be, or that adventurer would do something about it. Anyhow, thank you.

dialogue.name: HUNGRYGIRL04469
dialogue.text: Thank you, fluffy little helper! We'll be sure not to eat them all at once!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip!♪

dialogue.name: HUNGRYGIRL04469
dialogue.text: These are so tasty! Better than anything my mum could make.

dialogue.name: TIMIDBOY04469
dialogue.text: These little snowballs are so sweet and crunchy... Thank you, little helpers!

dialogue.name: BOREDBOY04469
dialogue.text: All I got for Starlight last year was a tattered, hand-me-down hat... Then again, I suppose I should be grateful I got anything at all.

dialogue.name: QUIETGIRL04469
dialogue.text: I wanted to go into the city to see the Saint of Nymeia, but Mother told me it's too dangerous to go alone. Doesn't she realize I'm not a baby anymore?

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip!

dialogue.name: BOREDBOY04469
dialogue.text: M-M-Monster! You─adventurer! Do something!

dialogue.name: QUIETGIRL04469
dialogue.text: Wait! I think it's holding something... What have you got there, little friend?

dialogue.name: QUIETGIRL04469
dialogue.text: Are those...presents for us?

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Rudy presents the gifts with remarkable aplomb.

dialogue.name: BOREDBOY04469
dialogue.text: Snowballs made of sugar? I've never seen anything like these before.

dialogue.name: QUIETGIRL04469
dialogue.text: They look so good! And I'm going to tell all my friends I got them from the cutest saint's helper of them all!

dialogue.name: BOREDBOY04469
dialogue.text: They smell delicious. Thank you very much for the gift, little helper! And you, too, MissusMister Adventurer!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip!

dialogue.name: BOREDBOY04469
dialogue.text: Those snowball sweets were so good!

dialogue.name: QUIETGIRL04469
dialogue.text: I can't believe I got to meet one of the saint's little helpers! And that he was so fluffy!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Behold, Rudy! The children simply adore the gifts you gave them!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip yip!

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Ye should be proud o' yerselves. Yer snowball sweets're the talk o' the town, and not just among the wee ones. Ye've brought us all a Starlight miracle this year!

dialogue.name: WOODWAILER04469
dialogue.text: (-Man's Shout-)What the─!? Yetis! Yetis in the ranch! Take cover at once!

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Trouble at the south gate!?

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: What in the seven hells is goin' on?

dialogue.name: WOODWAILER04469
dialogue.text: I...I know not from where, but a pair of most fearsome yetis just stormed through the gates!

dialogue.name: LARGEYETI
dialogue.text: Grrroooooowrrr!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip? Yip yip. Yip...

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Hm? Oh. Oh dear. Yes, I see...

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Lend me your ears, friends. There is no need to panic. Our large friends here haven't come to attack us. These are simply Rudy's siblings, come to take their little brother home.

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Yer a lucky little yeti to have such good family worryin' after ye, Rudy. Er, even if they do look like they're about to pummel ye...

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: I cannot deny that they are somewhat...disgruntled. They disprove of the fact that Rudy allowed himself to be “captured” so easily.

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Captured? Think he can't fend for himself, do they?

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip? Yip yip...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Tell them that's not what happened!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Give 'em what for!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: ...Yip!

dialogue.name: LARGEYETI
dialogue.text: Grrroooooowrrr!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip yip!

dialogue.name: LARGEYETI
dialogue.text: Grrrowr!?

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip yip! Yip! Yip! Yip!

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Well? What're they sayin'? Did they sort it out?

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Oh, I'd say! Our little friend Rudy corrected them in scathing terms.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: He told them of the delicious snowball treats we made together, and how the children's faces lit up when we gave them their presents. He further added that he may be small, but he's proud as can be of what he accomplished─and shan't let anyone belittle him any more!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip yip?

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Say, Rudy. How about letting your brothers try your snowballs? A taste is worth a thousand words, after all.

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Aye, nothin' like sharin' tasty treats to bring a family together.

dialogue.name: LARGEYETI
dialogue.text: Grrr... Grooowr!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Well, isn't that nice of them? Rudy's brothers just apologized for how they've treated Rudy all this time. They said they're proud to call him a brother, and that he is more than welcome to join in their snowball fights from now on!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip yip!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Rudy's brothers have finally accepted him for who he is. Turns out all he needed was a little help and support. Isn't that right, Forename?

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Perhaps little Rudy had even more support than we thought. Aye, it's the damnedest thing, but I just can't shake the feelin' that there's someone else watching over us...

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip! Yip yip yip!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Rudy says that he intends to return with his brothers to their mountain home, and that he so very much enjoyed his time with us. He only wishes he could have properly thanked the Saint of Nymeia before he left...

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: I wouldn't worry about that. Aye, I reckon the saint heard ye clear as can be. Look! This was sittin' by those tasty morsels ye made. It's a letter─from you know who.

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text:
(-Enigmatic Letter-)Dear Rudy,
Your delightful little snowball treats simply sparkled with festive Starlight spirit. I daresay you were the finest of all my helpers this season! Ho ho ho!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Do you hear that, Rudy? It would seem the saint was watching you work the whole time!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip? Yip yip! Yip!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip yip! Yip? Yip yip yip! Yip yip...

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Oh, Rudy... Of course we will miss you too.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Forename. Rudy says that were it not for us, he never would have realized what he was capable of, or found the confidence to stand up to his brothers.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: He says that everyone he met here was so incredibly kind that he was able to make the best snowballs he's ever made.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: And finally, he says thank you, Forename, for making this such a miraculous, memorable experienceーone that he will cherish for the rest of his life!

dialogue.name: RUDOLPH
dialogue.text: Yip yip!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Fare thee well, Rudy! And promise that you'll come back to see your friends again someday, yes?

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Back home ye go, then! Take care o' yerself out there.

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Aye, it'll be lonely here without the little guy...

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Worry not, my friends. Your paths may very well cross again someday. After all, we never know what fate has in store for us.

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: And with that, we had best return and report to Amh Garanjy. I suspect she'll be thrilled, if sad to hear that Rudy has gone away home...

dialogue.name: BAENFAELD
dialogue.text: Amh'll be overjoyed to hear of yer success. I'd go with ye, but as ye can see, I've got me hands full with gifts still...

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Go on, Forename. Tell her everything that happened with Rudy.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: All done handing out presents, are you? Thank you very much! And good work, Ru─ Wait...where's Rudy gone off to?

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Home with his brothers? But I didn't get a chance to say goodbye! Oh, to ruffle his fluffy fur one last time...

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: You were quite fond of the little fellow, weren't you?

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Of course! Who wouldn't get attached to that adorably pouty little face?

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: ...But if he's happy now, that's all that matters. Allow me to thank you both once more.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Not just for your help with the festivities, but for everything you did for Rudy as well. You helped him find the confidence he needed to make his siblings accept him.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Why, if Rudy's exploits don't fill you with the spirit of Starlight, I daresay nothing willーas a matter of fact, I myself am feeling more enthusiastic about the Celebration than ever!

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: And as head celebrant, I will do all in my power to spread smiles and joy with as much passion as Rudy did!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: I, too, very much enjoyed the time we spent together. Truly, it was full of new experiences to look back upon fondly. Isn't that so, Forename?

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: Yet I fear the time has come for us to part ways. After all, I've lands to traverse, people to meet, and sweets to eat!

dialogue.name: RISSAI
dialogue.text: I very much hope to see you again someday. And who is to say? Should you ever find yourself in a pinch with a beast again, I may very well appear to lend an ear. Farewell!

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Thank you, truly. I know it isn't much, but please take this as a humble token of my appreciation.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: And believe it or not, the saint himself has expressed an interest in meeting you. No doubt he wishes to thank you in person! Whenever you have a moment, pray say the word.
